src:
Hilton bo kmalu odprl svoj hotel tudi v Trstu
06 Nov 2019, 10:27 by Spletno uredništvo

Palača zavarovalnice Ras na Trgu republike v Trstu bo konec novembra ali na začetku decembra zaživela v hotelski preobleki.



Palača zavarovalnice Ras na Trgu republike v Trstu bo konec novembra ali na začetku decembra zaživela v hotelski preobleki.  Foto: Vir:Primorski dnevnik/FotoDamjan

TRST > Na približno 8000 kvadratnih metrov veliki površini bo zaživel hotel Double Tree by Hilton, ki bo ponujal 125 štirizvezdičnih sob za 250 gostov, poroča Primorski dnevnik. V preteklih dneh so delavci odstranili še zadnje delavske odre v Ul. San Caterina, kjer v teh dneh urejajo pločnik za pešce, že pred tedni pa so odstranili lesene ograje pred vhodom v bodoči hotel.
Kot je za časnik povedal Andrea De Leo, marketinški menedžer hotelske družbe Hnh, je že skoraj vse nared za odprtje novega hotela. Vse sobe so že urejene, zadnje podrobnosti urejajo še v restavraciji in hotelski kavarni. Konec meseca pričakujejo še nadzor odgovornih pri hotelski verigi Hilton, ki bodo dali zeleno luč odprtju hotela. “Hotelsko nastanitev v našem novem hotelu že nekaj časa promoviramo na različnih družbenih omrežjih, sobe pa tržimo na portalu booking.com,” je še dodal DeLeo.
text:
The Hilton is about to open its hotel in Trieste as well
06 Nov 2019, 10:27 by Web Editing

The Palace of the Insurance Company Ras in the Republic Square in Trieste will come to life at the end of November or the beginning of December.



The Palace of the Insurance Company Ras in the Republic Square in Trieste will come to life at the end of November or the beginning of December. Photo: Source: Primorski dnevnik / PhotoDamjan

TRST> The Double Tree by Hilton hotel, which will offer 125 four-star rooms for 250 guests, will live on an approximately 8,000-square-meter surface, reports the Primorski daily. In recent days, workers removed the last scaffolding at Ul. San Caterina, where pedestrian sidewalks are being built these days, and wooden fences were removed just weeks ago from the entrance to a future hotel.
As Andrea De Leo, marketing manager at Hnh, told the newspaper, almost everything is ready to open a new hotel. All the rooms are already decorated, the latest details are also in the restaurant and hotel cafe. At the end of the month, they expect to oversee those responsible for the Hilton hotel chain, who will give the green light to opening the hotel. "We have been promoting hotel accommodation in our new hotel on various social networks for some time now, and we are marketing the rooms on booking.com," DeLeo added.
